caption.p: Maps of values of R 0 estimated from ANUSPLIN observations (1971–2000; A) and projected climate obtained from the CRCM4.2.3 driven by CGCM3.1 T47, following the SRES A2 GHG emission scenario for 2011–2040 ( B) and 2041–2070 ( C). The color scale indicates R 0 values. Within the zones where R 0 of I. scapularis is > 1, geographic occurrence of Lyme disease risk is also limited by other environmental variables (Diuk-Wasser et al. 2012).
